attributes.action: Change the dangerous dog act to stop discrimination against specific breeds
attributes.additional_details:
Please sign this petition if you beleive the dangerous dog act should not be breed specific ,

Please sign if you think a dog doesn't deserve to be put to sleep just because it falls into a certain size shape and weight category,

Please sign this petition if you beleive innocent dogs are being killed due to the dangerous dogs act and it needs to stop
attributes.background:
Dangerous dogs can be all shapes and sizes , 
 To say that certain breeds are dangerous and should be put to sleep just because they are a certain size shape or colour is not humane !
 And in 2016 this needs to change each and every dog should be judged on its merits not on its breed !
